name: Lounge
_source: s;Anuki;Looks comfortable.{w} I can see why Roland rarely left his manor.
s;Simon;Did he not interact with the other lords much then?

s;Anuki;Not to my knowledge at least.{w}{br}We'd only see him when father was trying to get our land back.{w}{br}And it's not like Roland did much to help anyone except himself.{w}{br}He was barely holding bandits back from his own land.

s;Simon;I guess I'm just ashamed to admit that House Verstadt has been the same under my rule.{w}{br}I rarely worked with the remaining lords.{w} And I did a pitiful job of protecting our lands from the New Dawn.
s;Simon;Not what I was hoping to hear...
s;Anuki;I barely knew you existed, even though our houses bordered each other.{w}{br}And yes, the New Dawn attacked and you couldn't defend.
s;Anuki;But at the same time, I don't know what I would have done if I were put in your position.{w}{br}I'm glad I wasn't stuck trying to rule without guidance.
s;Anuki;And look, I hate to admit it to your face,{w} but you've got guts doing all you've done after your house fell.
s;Simon;Thanks.{w} It turns out all of this has been a cruel wakeup call.{w}{br}If I'm still ruling after all of this is done, I won't make the same mistakes again.
